## Matrix4.multiplyByVector() method

Computes the product of a matrix and a column vector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static multiplyByVector(matrix: Matrix4, cartesian: Cartesian4, result?: Cartesian4): Cartesian4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | The matrix. |
|  cartesian | [Cartesian4](./toygl.cartesian4.md) | The vector. |
|  result | [Cartesian4](./toygl.cartesian4.md) | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

[Cartesian4](./toygl.cartesian4.md)

The modified result parameter.
